resources.string: \nThis is text set by the default theme fontPath.\n
\nThis has a font path set to Roboto Bold.\n
\nThis has a fontPath set to a font file that does not exist, it goes back to the default.\n
\nThis has the font family defined in the style as Roboto Condensed.\n
\nThis has the font family defined in the style appearance as Roboto Condensed.\n
This is a custom TextView with custom font.\n
